tldr: Affected versions of the package are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) when opening a tab based on user-defined input. If user input is not properly sanitized, an attacker could inject malicious scripts that execute in the context of another user's session, leading to potential data theft, session hijacking, or other malicious actions.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `github.com/hashicorp/consul` library to the patch version.
